@JafferWilson Then could you try the following steps?

  1. Install intel-openmp pip install intel-openmp mkl
  2. Check iomp5 library existence
where mkl_rt.dll
where libiomp5md.dll
  1. Install VC 2017 Redist https://aka.ms/vs/15/release/VC_redist.x64.exe
  2. Check VC 2017 library existence where api-ms-win-crt-utility-l1-1-0.dll
body_text:
@JafferWilson Then could you try the following steps?

Install intel-openmp pip install intel-openmp mkl
Check iomp5 library existence

where mkl_rt.dll
where libiomp5md.dll

Install VC 2017 Redist https://aka.ms/vs/15/release/VC_redist.x64.exe
Check VC 2017 library existence where api-ms-win-crt-utility-l1-1-0.dll
body:
@JafferWilson Then could you try the following steps?
1. Install intel-openmp `pip install intel-openmp mkl`
2. Check iomp5 library existence 
```cmd
where mkl_rt.dll
where libiomp5md.dll
```
3. Install VC 2017 Redist https://aka.ms/vs/15/release/VC_redist.x64.exe
4. Check VC 2017 library existence `where api-ms-win-crt-utility-l1-1-0.dll`
